explanation: This action transfers funds from the Operation and Maintenance, Defense- Wide, 23/23, appropriation to various appropriations to execute the Department’s Innovative Readiness Training within the Civil Military Program. The funds will finance costs associated with the Navy Reserve and Air Force Reserves’ Active Duty for Training, travel, and applicable statutory allowances, and will provide support and services to eligible organizations and activities outside the Department of Defense pursuant to section 2012 of title 10, United States Code.
